content:
Here are the adverb + adjective pairs and their corresponding sigmoid-transformed pairs:

Terribly bad (0.0000) - Terribly bad
Very awful (0.0250) - Very awful
Quite poor (0.1000) - Quite poor
Somewhat mediocre (0.2250) - Somewhat mediocre
Fairly below average (0.4000) - Fairly below average
Perfectly average (0.5000) - Perfectly average
Reasonably decent (0.6000) - Reasonably decent
Very good (0.7750) - Very good
Extremely great (0.9000) - Extremely great
Incredibly excellent (0.9750) - Incredibly excellent
Absolutely outstanding (1.0000) - Absolutely outstanding

These are the adverb + adjective pairs transformed using the sigmoid-like function, providing a more intuitive mapping between the original pairs and the range from "bad" (0.0) to "good" (1.0).
